name: AttributeTest
description: Unit tests for the Attribute class in the Jsoup library.

test_cases.name: html
test_cases.description: Tests the html method of the Attribute class to ensure it correctly formats the attribute.

test_cases.name: testWithSupplementaryCharacterInAttributeKeyAndValue
test_cases.description: Tests the html method with supplementary characters in the attribute key and value.

test_cases.name: validatesKeysNotEmpty
test_cases.description: Tests that the Attribute constructor validates keys are not empty.

test_cases.name: validatesKeysNotEmptyViaSet
test_cases.description: Tests that the setKey method validates keys are not empty.

test_cases.name: booleanAttributesAreEmptyStringValues
test_cases.description: Tests that boolean attributes have empty string values and are correctly identified.

test_cases.name: settersOnOrphanAttribute
test_cases.description: Tests the setters on an orphan Attribute object.

test_cases.name: hasValue
test_cases.description: Tests the hasDeclaredValue method to check if an attribute has a declared value.

test_cases.name: canSetValueToNull
test_cases.description: Tests that the setValue method can set the value to null.

test_cases.name: booleanAttributesAreNotCaseSensitive
test_cases.description: Tests that boolean attributes are not case-sensitive and are correctly parsed.
